text: The prime minister of Greenland (, lit Leader of the government; ), officially referred to as the premier,Memberslof the Cabinet Government of Greenland is the head of the Government of Greenland, the autonomous territory within the Kingdom of Denmark. The incumbent prime minister is Kim Kielsen of the Siumut party. The prime minister is usually leader of the majority party in the Parliament of Greenland. Jonathan Motzfeldt became prime minister after home rule was granted to Greenland in 1979. ==List of prime ministers of Greenland== ==Timeline== ==See also== *List of governors of Greenland ==References== Greenland, List of Prime Ministers of Prime Ministers of Greenland
title: Prime Minister of Greenland
